description_carte: The Umbral Weaver. Controls shadows to ensnare foes and drain their life force.
description_visuelle: A shadowy humanoid figure with glowing red eyes and clawed hands. Dark mist swirls around him, obscuring his form.

skills.name: Shadow Strike
skills.description: Strikes an enemy with shadowy claws, dealing damage.

skills.name: Life Drain
skills.description: Drains life force from an enemy, dealing damage and healing Nocturne.

skills.name: Shadow Prison
skills.description: Traps an enemy in a prison of shadows, reducing their speed.

skills.name: Abyssal Curse
skills.description: Inflicts a powerful curse, dealing damage every turn for 3 turns.

skills.name: Void Eruption
skills.description: Unleashes a cataclysmic explosion of dark energy, dealing massive damage to all enemies and absorbing a portion of the damage dealt as HP.
